attributes.action: Assign me as an england fan to appoint me and any journalist to sit on the board of the Fa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is time for change time for the new and get rid of the old regime. it is time now for fans and journalists,to have a say who england appoint as manager. the time is right while we have the oppotunaty to push this through before they mess things up again and again.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
